text:
Yo Dost! I don't really remember exactly when we became friends (I just remember we watched a movie together in second yr summers) but I am glad we did. And here we are what we can call as virtual best friends‚úåÔ∏è. You are amazingly weird guy with a lots of cousins and a person who is extremely obsessed with the organization of things (which I love btw) xD. Hope we'll survive rest of the semesters and the placements together as we survived this year. Definitely last yr would have been boring without you. Hope we'll make infinite more memories together in our last yr on campus (if we ever returned :p). Cheers to our friendship ü§ü
PS: Your name is still saved as "giraffe" in my phone xD
author: Ritika  Ajmera

text: yeah we met in the hall office for the first time xD and same! you were the first girl I talked to in our batch.
author: Ritika  Ajmera

text:
Yo Gunjan!
We definitely had a great time during the bady summer camp. I loved the way you led us during the warm up exercises and cool down exercises.....aise nhi aise kro xD. Aise hi sbki GPL lete rehna aur mast khaate peete rehna. I always loved your bindaas attitude. Stay awesome! Hope our paths cross again.
author: Ritika  Ajmera

text:
Yo Pragya! üññ
If there is a one line description of you its - " chota packet bada dhamaka" ! I still cannot forget that scary post you shared on my birthday xD Always admired your energy and dedication about things. Aise hi chaapte rho! Hope to stay in touch in future.
author: Ritika  Ajmera

text: Yo Orientation partner, PSY151 partner, ART 106 partner, PE partner (our group was probably the most fraud group xD ). We have had a lot of common things in first year. Hope to stay in touch <3. All the best for the future!
author: Ritika  Ajmera

text: Hey old friend! I can surely say you were the first good male friend I had in first year xD kitna ghoomte the yr apan log aur kitna baat krte the. It was always fun! I wish maine TEDX me itna fraud nhi mara hota :p, we would have spent more time together. I know hum itni baat nhi krte but you were always special for me. I hope our paths cross again. Stay the amazing person you are! And yes, hats off to your dedication towards E-cell! Aise hi chaapte rho!
author: Ritika  Ajmera

text:
Throughout the course SOC481 I thought that you were a Y16 :p (idk why ) until you finally corrected me. I am glad I did the course NLP and got to meet you and Abhishek, vo alag baat hai course me kch nhi kiya xD. I hope we'll stay in touch! All the very best for future. 
PS: ye aajkal jo tum digital art kr rhe ho mjhe bhi sikha dena xD
author: Ritika  Ajmera

text:
Hey old roomie! Thanks for being such an amazing roommate. One thing I'll always be proud of is that our room was one of the cleanest rooms in our batch xD. I'm gonna miss so many things - aunty ke chocolate filled cakes (which I stole everytime :p), your M club posters and my wall painting, all those gossips about random people and random bitching, eagerly waiting for each episode of GOT, our alarms ringing alternatively and we procrastinating getting up for hours and so much more. Thanks for always listening to me - I could literally tell you everything knowing that you will keep it a secret. Thanks for making me try that blueberry yoghurt and for filling the CS form for me and priya :p. One time you wore a one-piece and straightened your hair...that day will always be remembered xD.  
I still remember how you somehow end up getting injured all the time in first year... ped se takra jana, cycle se gir jana, washroom me phone gira dena lol. You are a bunch of talent. I still don't know how many more hidden talents you have .... music painting studies and so much more, chalo at least we can leave dancing :p Wish you all the luck for the new journey you're gonna start. You will always have a special place in my heart. Just remember I am just a phone call away<3. "Keep Smiling" and keep rocking!
author: Ritika  Ajmera
